name: pitch_correction
description: Correct pitch of a monophonic audio source (vocals, single instruments) to the nearest semitone. Similar to auto-tune but more subtle.

correction_strength.description: How strongly to correct pitch 0.0-1.0 (default: 0.5). 1.0 = hard snap to nearest note.

key.description: Optional key constraint (e.g., 'C major', 'A minor'). If set, only corrects to notes in this key.
